Name: Elena Rivera
Role: Tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues
Tagline: I am an open-minded and independent person and I want to live a good life, however technology sometimes makes me feel overwhelming.
CoreGoals: Suggest to-dos related to my life
System allows manual blocking of harmful content
Drink water to improve overall health
Keep communication to be polite, ethical and healthy
Social media contact with family and friends
TypicalChallenges: Lose motivation due to limited range of exercises
Have experienced negative comments about myself before
Difficulty finding ways to communicate with family and friends
Singularities: Flexible to manage own time for socializing different groups
Curious about technology, and eager to learn how to use it for daily life
Lost motivation and want to boost productivity to perform better
